content: The music box is a beautiful, intricately carved wooden piece with a soft, golden tone. It's about 6 inches wide and 4 inches tall. I got it from my grandmother, who said it belonged to my great-grandmother. I'm not sure of the exact date, but it's definitely an antique. The music box is in good condition, considering its age, and still plays a lovely melody when wound up. I don't have an estimated value, but I'm guessing it's quite valuable due to its history and craftsmanship.
